stories.text:
Available .com domain name ideas drop for your project/blog

This started on a different thread [0], it seems quite a few people are interested in finding nice domain names for their projects / blogs.

Below is a list of random & interesting (well, according to my filter) available .com domains. Feel free to claim them for your blog / project / business / campaign, or just have a laugh at the funny ones.

stories.title: Available .com domain name ideas drop for your project/blog

stories.text:
TLDR; Would love for TLDR comments to rank higher so we don't have to read "every" interesting article but can still get more out of the comments thread.

Often a great article is posted on HN but you don't feel you have the time to read it (especially if it's a long one with detailed or complex info throughout). I'd love if people start a comment with "TLDR;" that it gets special treatment (ranked slightly higher by default or highlighted or something) in order to encourage people to provide a quick little bullet summary of articles. I think it could increase some valuable conversations without reducing the quality of them. Worth an experiment. Thoughts?
stories.title: Suggest HN: Rank or Highlight TLDR Comments?
